pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:0.5: Ime kho panāyyāyo sattarasa saṅghādisesā dhammā uddesaṁ āgacchanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro upāsako bhikkhunisaṅghassa udositaṁ datvā kālaṅkato hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.4: eko assaddho appasanno, eko saddho pasanno.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.6: Atha kho so assaddho appasanno taṁ saddhaṁ pasannaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.8: Evaṁ vutte, so saddho pasanno taṁ assaddhaṁ appasannaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.11: Dutiyampi kho so assaddho appasanno taṁ saddhaṁ pasannaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.13: Atha kho so saddho pasanno taṁ assaddhaṁ appasannaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.16: Tatiyampi kho so assaddho appasanno taṁ saddhaṁ pasannaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.22: Atha kho so udosito tehi bhājīyamāno tassa assaddhassa appasannassa pāpuṇāti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.23: Atha kho so assaddho appasanno bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.25: Evaṁ vutte thullanandā bhikkhunī taṁ purisaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.26: “māyyo, evaṁ avaca, tumhākaṁ pitunā bhikkhunisaṅghassa dinno”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.30: Evaṁ vutte, thullanandā bhikkhunī te mahāmatte etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.31: “api nāyyā tumhehi diṭṭhaṁ vā sutaṁ vā sakkhiṁ ṭhapayitvā dānaṁ diyyamānan”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.33: “saccaṁ kho ayyā āhā”ti taṁ udositaṁ bhikkhunisaṅghassa akaṁsu.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.34: Atha kho so puriso parājito ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.39: Atha kho so puriso daṇḍito bhikkhunupassayassa avidūre ājīvakaseyyaṁ kārāpetvā ājīvake uyyojesi—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.44: “paṭhamaṁ bhikkhuniyo udositaṁ acchindāpesuṁ, dutiyaṁ daṇḍāpesuṁ, tatiyaṁ bandhāpesuṁ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.46: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.47: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.49: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.50: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī ussayavādikā viharatī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.53: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī ussayavādikā viharissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.55: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.56.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī ussayavādikā vihareyya gahapatinā vā gahapatiputtena vā dāsena vā kammakārena vā antamaso samaṇaparibbājakenāpi, ayaṁ bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṁ dhammaṁ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṁ saṅghādisesan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:2.1.16: bhikkhuñca bhikkhuniñca sikkhamānañca sāmaṇerañca sāmaṇeriñca ṭhapetvā yo koci paribbājakasamāpanno.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:2.1.17: Aḍḍaṁ karissāmīti dutiyaṁ vā pariyesati gacchati vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:2.1.26: saṅghova tassā āpattiyā mānattaṁ deti mūlāya paṭikassati abbheti, na sambahulā na ekā bhikkhunī. Tena vuccati “saṅghādiseso”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:2.1.27: Tasseva āpattinikāyassa nāmakammaṁ adhivacanaṁ. Tenapi vuccati “saṅghādiseso”ti.
